description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Modal' that provides a simple modal dialog UI. It handles open/close states, accessibility attributes, and keyboard events for closing the modal.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a modal dialog with optional footer and handles close events like Escape key press and backdrop clicks.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export function Modal({ open, title, children, onClose, footer }) {$/
